name: gov.nawcad-creative-lab.sandbox-assets
description:
Scriptable objects allowing for the creation of variables, references and events inside the Unity Asset folder.

The samples in this package are in order of dependency.

samples.description: Contains a test scene for the Asset Listener.
Contains a test scene for the Animation State Invoker.
samples.path: Samples~/02 Event Animation State Invoker Test

samples.description: Contains a test scene for the Collider Invoker.
Contains a test scene for the Scene Listener.
Contains a test scene for the Button Invoker.
Contains a test scene for the Input Action Processor script.
Contains a test scene for the Application Controller script.
